pages.text: A flower with healing properties, Aum is a component in many spells. It can be found in forests.

Cerublossom flowers thrive in lush, green environments. They were one of the first magical plants discovered, being used in potions and light-focused spells. A short while after its discovery, it was also noted that the Cerublossom could be used as part of the $(l:items/purified_vinteum_dust)purification process for Vinteum Dust$().

Desert Novas grow in dry conditions. The Nova has extraordinary magical properties for a desert plant, and is highly sought after. It is one of the two plants used in the $(l:items/purified_vinteum_dust)purification process of Vinteum Dust$().
Lighter than it looks, Tarma Root grows in mountain biomes. It is an ingredient in spells and air essences.
Growing on the surface of water in warm climates, Wakebloom is used in water-based spells frequently, as well as being a component in water essence.
